Interface AdminPdfMgrIf

  • All Known Implementing Classes:

    public interface AdminPdfMgrIf
    AdminPdfMgrIf

    • Method Detail

      • getPdf

        PdfResult getPdf(PdfOptions options)
          throws java.lang.Exception
        Create the PDF document and return the URL, File name or bytes as defined by the input options.
        Parameters:
        options - the options that define the PDF report to be produced and what is returned from this interface. If the html attribute on PdfOptions is set this is used as the source for the PDF otherwise getHtml on the AdminHgetAdminHtmlMgr is called to produce the HTML.
        Returns:
        a PdfResult object containing information that is defined in the options specified on input.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - an unexpected exception

      • refreshConfigs

        void refreshConfigs()
             throws java.lang.Exception
        Retrieve some commonly-used properties and set the velocity log file location
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - an unexpected exception

      • modifyHtml

        java.lang.String modifyHtml(java.lang.String html)
                     throws java.lang.Exception
        A customisation point to allow for modification of the HTML prior to being converted to PDF
        Parameters:
        html - the HTML to modify
        Returns:
        the modified HTML
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - an unexpected exception

      • createPDFFromHTML

        void createPDFFromHTML(PdfOptions options,
                       java.lang.String html,
                       java.lang.String pdfFileName)
                throws java.lang.Exception
        Created the PDF file from the specified HTML String
        Parameters:
        options - the PdfOptions options object which might one day be used to affect the PDF generation if this method is overriden.
        html - the HTML String to convert into a PDF file
        pdfFileName - the target pdfFileName
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - an unexpected exception
